value: I've got a letter. Looks like it's about Ember.
It says "I know you are hiding a dragon offspring. Give her away or your little village will be demolished."
"This is the only warning. Bring it to the Aeros' Forest entrance."
Hmm, I guess we have a new task on our hands.
They make a threat against the village, and this looks like a trap.
I don't care. My harem is mine and if they dare to threaten it, I won't give them any mercy.
You really should stop seeing us as your property.
I don't care about property. I care about cute girls.
Well, I guess we will know it once we get there.
